name: Interface CookiePolicy
text:
CookiePolicy implementations decide which cookies should be accepted
 and which should be rejected. Three pre-defined policy implementations
 are provided, namely ACCEPT_ALL, ACCEPT_NONE and ACCEPT_ORIGINAL_SERVER.

 See RFC 2965 sec. 3.3 and 7 for more detail.

fields.description: One pre-defined policy which accepts all cookies.
One pre-defined policy which accepts no cookies.
One pre-defined policy which only accepts cookies from original server.

methods.description: Will be called to see whether or not this cookie should be accepted.
